SEARCH

Class item_inventory

java.lang.Object
item_inventory
public class item_inventory extends Object
This class represents the item inventory and gives an item count. Items: sword, heal potion, clear potion, smokebomb, coin all ints set to 0, since we have no items until we open a chest.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    item_inventory()
    Constructs a new item inventory with all item counts set to zero.
